oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of macrocyclic cyclophane-based unusual alpha-amino acid derivatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
HALDER, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cross-coupling reaction
stereoselective-synthesis
olefin metathesis
schiff-base
alkylation
peptides
amino acids
cyclophanes
macrocycles
alkylation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alkylation of ethyl isocyanoacetate with 1,2-bis(4-bromomethylphenyl)ethane under phase transfer catalysis (PTC) as well as phosphazene base [2-tert-butylimino-2-diethylamino-1,3-dimethylperhydro-1,3,2-diazaphosphorine (BEMP)] conditions gave the macrocyclic cyclophane based unusual alpha-amino acid derivatives.
